QuestData.Title: A Cry From Darkness
QuestData.Description: So, you survived the imperial clutches. You are... resilient.$B$BThe Klaxxi hear another paragon to the north, among the sha-scorched roots of Kypari Vor.$B$BThis one cries out in terror and agony. It cannot be saved.$B$BThe Klaxxi want him put down. Go and defeat him or do not return here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay the corrupted paragon at Kypari Vor.
QuestData.CompletionText: The order stands. Slay the fallen paragon.
QuestData.RewardText: What?! How did you...$B$BThe Deathcaller was a legendary hero. He must not have been fully wakened.$B$BYou are fortunate.
